<a id="CenterContainer"></a>

# CenterContainer

**Inherits:** [Container](Container.md) **\<** [Control](Control.md) **\<** [CanvasItem](CanvasItem.md) **\<** [Node](Node.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

A container that keeps child controls in its center.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

**CenterContainer** is a container that keeps all of its child controls in its center at their minimum size.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Tutorials

- [Using Containers](../tutorials/ui/gui_containers.md)

## Property Descriptions

<a id="CenterContainer_property_use_top_left"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **use_top_left** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#CenterContainer_property_use_top_left)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_use_top_left**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **is_using_top_left**\ (\ )

If ``true``, centers children relative to the **CenterContainer**'s top left corner.
